query.querystr: stmt s1, s2; Select s1 such that Follows(1,s1) such that Follows(s1,3)
assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses(a, v) and Modifies(a, v)
stmt s1, s2; while w; Select s1 such that Follows(s1, s2) and Parent(w, s1)
if i; assign a; Select i such that Parent(i, a) pattern a(_, _"add"_)
stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Follows*(s, _) and Uses(s, v)
while w; variable v; Select w such that Modifies(w, v) and Parent*(w, _)

id.comment: Combining Uses, Modifies, and Pattern Matching

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Uses(a, v) and Modifies(a, v)
stmt s1, s2; variable v; Select s1 such that Parent(s1, s2) and Follows(s1, s2) and Uses(s1, v)

id.comment: Combining Follows*, Modifies, and Uses with Different Entities

query.querystr: if i; assign a; variable v; Select i such that Follows*(i, a) and Modifies(i, v) and Uses(a, v)

id.comment: Multiple Uses Clauses with Different Variables

query.querystr: variable v1, v2; assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, v1) and Uses(a, v2)

id.comment: Follows* with Pattern and Uses Clauses

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select a such that Follows*(s, a) pattern a(_, _) such that Uses(a, v)

id.comment: Nested Conditions with Parent and Follows

query.querystr: if i; while w; stmt s; Select s such that Parent(i, w) and Follows(w, s)

id.comment: Combining All Clauses in a Single Query

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; if i; while w; variable v; Select s such that Parent*(w, s) and Follows*(11, s) and Modifies(s, v)
stmt s1, s2, s3; assign a1, a2; variable v; Select s1 such that Follows(s1, s2) and Parent(s2, a1) and Uses(a1, v) and Modifies(a2, v) pattern a2 ("variable", "hi")

id.comment: Complex Query with Multiple Synonyms with wrong and

query.querystr: stmt s1, s2, s3; assign a1, a2; variable v; Select s1 such that Follows(s1, s2) and Parent(s2, a1) and Uses(a1, v) and Modifies(a2, v) and pattern a2 ("variable", "hi")
